articles.title: Biracial American opera singer Maria Ewing dies aged 71 - Daily Mail
articles.description: Maria Ewing, 71, died Sunday at her home in Detroit, spokeswoman Bryna Rifkin said Monday. She was the ex-wife of theater director Sir Peter Hall and the mother of director Rebecca Hall.
articles.content:
The opera singer Maria Ewing, the ex-wife of theater director Sir Peter Hall and the mother of actress-director Rebecca Hall, has died at the age of 71.
